lead_paragraph: Steve Garban was harshly criticized over his handling of the crisis that engulfed Penn State after the arrest of Jerry Sandusky in a child sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: Steve Garban was harshly criticized over his handling of the crisis that engulfed Penn State after the arrest of Jerry Sandusky in a child sexual abuse scandal.
